root.name: Rondo of Swords
root.description: Rondo of Swords was developed by Success for the Nintendo DS. It was released on August 9, 2007 in Japan and April 15, 2008 in North America.GameplayAs with other similar games, movement is grid-based. Unlike other games however, Rondo of Swords uses a unique "Route Maneuver System". Enemies are attacked by running through them, allowing a character to attack multiple enemies in a single turn. Characters can also run through allies to provide bonuses to them.CharactersSerdic: Body double of Prince Serdic. When the prince is killed, Serdic takes his place.Marie: Prince Serdic's younger sister. She lives in a monastery.Kay: A knight of Bretwalde.Margus: A Bretwalde infantryman.
